name: Mr. Grind
description:
Mr. Grind is an endless clicker game that was created during Ludum Dare 45 (Compo entry) by using Unity Engine.

Game features an orc with his lovely pickaxe. Player have to mine gold ores to trade gem with the truck (NPC). Gems can be used to purchase one of the endless/limitless upgrades.

Controls
  • Use A and D keys to move around.
  • Use space key to jump.
  • Use LMB to mine gold ores from resource.

It was real fun developing Mr. Grind, hope you will enjoy.
